Entity.Description: This table stores all the configured services. It is populated when configuring services using the service builder framework or when configuring time triggered transactions for agents.
Entity.Name: Flow

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_FLOW table. This key represents the flow of the transaction.
Attribute.Name: FlowKey

Attribute.Description: This identifier is a reference to the YFS_GRAPH_UI table, where the pictorial representation of the service is stored.
Attribute.Name: GraphUIKey

Attribute.Description: The transport type key of the beginning transport node for asynchronous services or LOCAL for synchronous services.
Attribute.Name: TransportTypeKey

Attribute.Description: This key indicates the owner of the service. This value is "DEFAULT", which is the hub organization for all services. However, when moving event handlers and user exits, the user interface populates this with the appropriate enterprise organization key.
Attribute.Name: OwnerKey

Attribute.Description: The flow name is a unique identifier of the service. The field size is 128 bits to accommodate the backward compatibility naming format.
Attribute.Name: FlowName

Attribute.Description: The service group name, which is used as a logical placeholder for the services.
Attribute.Name: FlowGroupName

Attribute.Description: The flow type identifies the service associated with this table.
Attribute.Name: FlowType

Attribute.Description: This flag determines whether a real time response is needed.
Attribute.Name: IsRealTime

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the service is invoked synchronously or asynchronously.
Attribute.Name: IsOutGoing

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates if the service is system defined and is modifiable.
Attribute.Name: SystemDefined

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: This key determines all the services belonging to some process type
Attribute.Name: ProcessTypeKey

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if the service is used for printing the label using print document set APIs.
Attribute.Name: IsPrintService

Attribute.Description: This Flag indicates that the service is for data loading
Attribute.Name: DataLoadingService

Entity.Description: This table stores the configuration information at the sub flow (run time) level. Every service that is configured is translated to one or more sub flows. Depending on configuration, of each sub flow can be invoked synchronously or asynchronously by starting the IntegrationServer daemon).
Entity.Name: SubFlow

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_SUB_FLOW table.
Attribute.Name: SubFlowKey

Attribute.Description: The Server associated with this sub flow. However, not all sub flows are associated with the server.
Attribute.Name: ServerKey

Attribute.Description: The flow key associated with this sub flow.
Attribute.Name: FlowKey

Attribute.Description: Queue to which the exceptions of this subflow will be sent.
Attribute.Name: QueueKey

Attribute.Description: A unique identifier to the sub flow or runtime level. This name is used in system management console to expose the services running for a particular server.
Attribute.Name: SubFlowName

Attribute.Description: The number used to identify the first sub flow for a service.
Attribute.Name: SeqNo

Attribute.Description: A long column used to store the sub flow configuration.
Attribute.Name: ConfigXML

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores the Server Information associated with the Services, ServerKey is a foreign key in YFS_SUB_FLOW table. When the IntegrationAdapter is started with a serverName all the Sub Flows (or Runtime Id's) associated with the Server are started. All these subFlows should belong to the same Transport Protocol, such as DB, or JMS.
Entity.Name: Server

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SERVER.
Attribute.Name: ServerKey

Attribute.Description: Identifies if this Server belongs to AgentServer(01) or an IntegrationServer (00).
Attribute.Name: ServerType

Attribute.Description: Unique Name to identify a Server
Attribute.Name: ServerName

Attribute.Description: The transport protocol this Server is associated with.
Attribute.Name: TransportTypeKey

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the server needs to be terminated on completion of work. Completion is defined as all threads in the server being idle for the specified amount of time.
Attribute.Name: Terminate

Attribute.Description: Initial wait time before the server starts monitoring the idle threads
Attribute.Name: MonitorStartTime

Attribute.Description: Once all threads are idle, the server waits till the wait_time is exceeded before terminating.
Attribute.Name: WaitTime

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores information about custom Adapters, the interoperability framework which provides hooks to connect to external systems. Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table is used to synchronize the getJobs method call for time triggered transactions, agents, and the trigger agents. This entity contains a record for the criteria being locked. Each of the time triggered transaction java classes have a getJob method that obtains a lock on the corresponding record in this table before starting on the getJobs. This entity has been designed for use in other scenarios too.
Entity.Name: Object_Lock

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_OBJECT_LOCK table.
Attribute.Name: Object_Lock_Key

Attribute.Description: The type of the object being locked. This indicates that the criteria is being locked.
Attribute.Name: Locked_Object_Type

Attribute.Description: The object being locked. This indicates the criteria ID is being locked.
Attribute.Name: Locked_Object

Attribute.Description: The object parameters that are being locked.
Attribute.Name: Locked_Parameters

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the status of the locked object.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This table stores infomation about the interop reprocessable errors. When a service is configured to reprocess errors, the IntegrationServer populates this table with the appropriate error message and the input XML. This information is displayed in the exception console and the user can correct the XML and reprocess the error.
Entity.Name: Error

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_REPROCESS_ERROR table.
Attribute.Name: ErrorTxnId

Attribute.Description: This field is deprecated.
Attribute.Name: SystemName

Attribute.Description: This field is deprecated.
Attribute.Name: ApiName

Attribute.Description: The service associated with this error.
Attribute.Name: FlowName

Attribute.Description: The sub flow or RuntimeID associated with this error.
Attribute.Name: SubFlowName

Attribute.Description: An error reference. During configuration of a service, name/value pairs can be entered which are populated in this table. These values can be used to filter data when looking for specific errors.
Attribute.Name: ErrorReference

Attribute.Description: The reprocessable errors can be grouped by the group name, so all related errors can be reprocessed at the same time.
Attribute.Name: ExceptionGroupName

Attribute.Description: This is the primary key of the registered alert in YFS_INBOX table.
Attribute.Name: ExceptionId

Attribute.Description: This is a system generated unique identifier for the exception group.

Attribute.Description: A queue identifier.
Attribute.Name: QueueId

Attribute.Description: This field is used internally for processing error groups.
Attribute.Name: Storefront

Attribute.Description: This field is deprecated.
Attribute.Name: TransactionName

Attribute.Description: The error description of the exception is stored in this column.
Attribute.Name: ErrorString

Attribute.Description: The error state. Valid values are: Initial, Saved, Modified, Fixed, Ignore.
Attribute.Name: State

Attribute.Description: The error code of the exception.
Attribute.Name: ErrorCode

Attribute.Description: A unique message group ID. If the input message has YantraMessageGroupID, the attribute value will be copied into this column.
Attribute.Name: YantraMessageID

Attribute.Description: A unique key used to identify the message. This key is returned as part of the response.
Attribute.Name: UniqueKey

Attribute.Description: The system generated unique identifier for the exception group.
Attribute.Name: ParentTxnId

Attribute.Description: The complete error message including the stack trace for the exception.
Attribute.Name: ErrorMessage

Attribute.Description: The input XML to the sub flow.
Attribute.Name: Message

Attribute.Description: This field is deprecated.
Attribute.Name: DestinationCode

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.

Entity.Description: This table stores base transactions defined in the system.
Entity.Name: Base_Transaction

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_BASE_TRANSACTION table.
Attribute.Name: Base_Transaction_Key

Attribute.Description: The base process type that is associated with this base transaction.
Attribute.Name: Base_Process_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this transaction is an abstract transaction.
Attribute.Name: Abstract_Transaction

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for a base transaction.
Attribute.Name: BaseTranid

Attribute.Description: The organization code that owns this transaction.
Attribute.Name: Owner_Key

Attribute.Description: The base transaction's name.
Attribute.Name: BaseTranname

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a task queue record needs to be created for this transaction. Tasks are created if a document reaches the status picked by this transaction.
Attribute.Name: Works_Off_Task_Q

Attribute.Description: The type of tasks that this transaction processes. This field is used by the workflow engine to determine whether tasks needs be created for this transaction upon completion by other transaction.
Attribute.Name: Task_Q_Key_Type

Attribute.Description: The type of the listener transaction. Each process type to process type combination consistutes a different listener type.
Attribute.Name: Listener_Type

Attribute.Description: The base process type that a base transaction listens to for status changes.
Attribute.Name: Base_Process_Type_Listened_To

Attribute.Description: The java class used for consuming work flow messages being sent to a pipeline.
Attribute.Name: Agent_Java_Class

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether derived document types are required.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Derived_Doc_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether chained document types are required.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Chained_Doc_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates how pickup statuses will be filtered.
Attribute.Name: Pick_Status_Filter

Attribute.Description: This field indicates how drop statuses will be filtered.
Attribute.Name: Drop_Status_Filter

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this base transaction can only have one drop status.
Attribute.Name: Single_Drop_Status

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this base transaction is externally triggered.
Attribute.Name: Externally_Triggerable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this base transaction is time-triggered.
Attribute.Name: Time_Triggerable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this base transaction is user-triggered.
Attribute.Name: User_Triggerable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this transaction is capable of understanding hold types. Default value is 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Type_Enabled

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this transaction is capable of resolving hold types. Default value is 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Can_Resolve_Hold_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates what type of support this type of transaction has for transaction dependencies.
Attribute.Name: Supported_Dependency_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates if transaction completion can be recorded for this transaction.
Attribute.Name: Supported_Completion_Type

Attribute.Description: The level at which a transaction can be prevented by a hold. Possible values are 'ORDER' and 'ORDER_LINE'.
Attribute.Name: Hold_Prevention_Level

Entity.Description: This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.

Attribute.Description: The last name of the person.

Attribute.Description: The country in the address.

Attribute.Description: The evening time phone at which the person or organization referred to in the address can be called.

Entity.Description: This table stores and maintains all resources in an application. The permissions are granted on a resource to a user group.

Attribute.Description: This identifies the original resource from which a particular resource is derived.

Attribute.Description: The type of resource.

Attribute.Description: A sequence number used to order child resources within a resource.

Attribute.Description: This indicates whether a resource is permission controlled. To be able to access these resources the users need specific grant access.
Attribute.Name: Is_Permission_Controlled

Attribute.Description: This is used for enabling search page to go directly to detail page without going through list page.
Attribute.Name: Show_Detail

Attribute.Description: A java event component on a form.

Attribute.Description: A java server page associated with the resource.

Attribute.Description: A java script associated with the resource.

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether decoration needs to be suppressed.
Attribute.Name: Suppress_Decoration

Attribute.Description:
When a view is marked as a redirector, then standard layout is not used for that view. Once the APIs are invoked, control is directly transfered to the JSP of the view. If a view is marked as redirector, then JSP must be specified.
An example use for this is when dynamically determining a view for an action. If an action is configured to go to a view that is marked as a redirector, then the redirector can dynamically determine the actual view to go to. Thus, we get the feature of having Action that can go to a dynamically determined view.
Attribute.Name: Redirector

Attribute.Description: This field groups together multiple detail views. This is used for resources of type ICON, ACTION and LINK.
Attribute.Name: View_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: The API version. This is provided for backward compatibility of the API.
Attribute.Name: Version

Attribute.Name: Application_Code

Attribute.Description: This field is valid if search condition results in only one record in list. The list view is not shown, instead detail view is shown directly.
Attribute.Name: Supports_Search_To_Detail

Attribute.Description: The help application code of the resource. Valid values are cmn, inv, omd, omr, oms, vas, wms, ycm, ycp, ydm, and blank.
Attribute.Name: Help_Application_Code

Attribute.Description: This indicates whether a resource should supress the Help options.
Attribute.Name: Suppress_Help

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the API should be executed in rollback-only mode.
Attribute.Name: Rollback_Only_Mode

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether the search view is used to execute Reports.
Attribute.Name: Is_Report
